main_definition: Paragraphs are distinct sections of a piece of writing that deal with separate points or ideas, typically separated by blank lines.

meanings_and_examples.example: The essay was divided into three paragraphs to clearly present the main arguments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A series of sentences on a similar subject, forming part of an essay, article, or book
meanings_and_examples.example: She wrote two short paragraphs explaining her research findings in more detail.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In programming and computer science, paragraphs refer to a block or unit of code or text that serves as a logical entity within the program.
meanings_and_examples.example: The software application was organized into different paragraphs representing various functionalities for easier maintenance.
